objtitle.title: Letter to George Cumberland, 26 August 1799, supplemental views

objinfo.numberleaves: 2The full sheet was folded to form two leaves, with Blake's letter written on the first recto (object 1), first verso (object 2), and second recto (object 3) of the folded sheet, which was sealed. The second verso is not photographed. The unfolded full sheet image contains objects 2 and 3 of Blake's letter to Dr. John Trusler of 16 August 1799.

provenance.name: Cumberland Papers
provenance.note: George Cumberland; bequeathed to his son, George Cumberland; presented to the British Library in 1849, as part of the Cumberland Papers consisting of thirty-one volumes and two rolls, on condition that these should not be opened until 1900.

desc.objtitle: Letter to George Cumberland, 26 August 1799, supplemental views, full sheet view, objects 2 and 3

objnote.p: The full sheet was folded to form two leaves, with Blake's letter written on the first recto (object 1), first verso (object 2), and second recto (object 3) of the folded sheet, which was sealed. The second verso is not photographed. The unfolded full sheet image contains objects 2 and 3 of Blake's letter to Dr. John Trusler of 16 August 1799.
In the top right corner the British Library folio number, "331", is inscribed in an unknown hand.
